answers.answer: Hi.  Have you visited a physician?  These symptoms could be caused from a number of disorders.It is possible that a simple work up could reveal the cause.....back problems, diabetes, dehydration, etc.Best to contact your physician.  Good luck.

question: I have a numbness and tingly feeling in my leg from the knee down to my ankle. It keeps coming off and on, and sometimes it evne switches legs... what is goign on or what should i do?
title: numbness
